title: White, Republican, and Vaccine Skeptical
description:
Nearly a third of republican voters say they’re not interested in getting a COVID-19 vaccine. What does that mean for the spread of the virus? 
Guest: Dan Diamond, national health reporter for the Washington Post. 
Slate Plus members get bonus segments and ad-free podcast feeds. Sign up now.

itunes:title: White, Republican, and Vaccine Skeptical
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Vaccine hesitancy lingers in many pockets of the country. What does that mean for the spread of the virus?
